build_orders.title: Scout Rush
build_orders.description: A well known build order for a Scout Rush (Scrush). You must go to Feudal age to build scouts to harras the enemy base by idling the economy and picking off some Villagers. If you civ starts with an Eagle Scout you cannot do this Build Order.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Hhouses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/7)

queue.description: Build 3 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep, your berries and another woodline.
queue.title: 3->Wood (9/10)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (10/11)

queue.description: Build a House and a Mill and gather berries.
queue.title: 3->Berries (13/14)

queue.description: Get the second Boar. Also build 2 Farms on the upper and lower right TC spots with hurt Vils.
queue.title: 1->Boar (14/15)
1->Berries (15/16)
queue.description: Don't forget to build another house with a Wood Vil.
By now you should have found all your resources, and be on your way to scout your opponent(s).
queue.title: 4->Sheep/Boar under TC (19/20)

queue.description: Build a second Lumbercamp at another Wood line.
queue.title: 2->Wood (21/22)

queue.description: (recommended) This is a great time to get Loom. If you are having trouble with keeping your TC busy (e.g. you missed Sheep), you could research it earlier
queue.title: Loom
Feudal Age, 3 from Sheep to Wood, Rest Farms
queue.description: Build a Barracks and another house with a Wood Vil. When your Sheep Vils are done move 3 of them to Wood and the rest to Farms.

queue.title: Stable, Wood Upgrade
queue.description: Then quickly build a Stable with 2 Vils, and research some Economy upgrades

queue.title: 3->Farms (24/25)
queue.description: More Farms. Also build at least 2 Houses. Berry Vils should also go to Farms.

queue.title: 4 Scouts (24/29)
queue.description: Build 4-6 Scouts. When done attack the enemy Vils. Keep away from the TC and Spearmen. Cause idle time and kill vils.

queue.title: 8->Gold (32/37)
queue.description: Make sure you continue building an army, based on what the enemies are building and your Civ's strengths. We need gold for that.

queue.title: 2 Archery Ranges, Blacksmith
queue.description: Build More Buildings so you can follow-up or defend. Upgrade either Archers or Cavalry, based on the situation and Civ.

queue.title: Wheelbarrow
queue.description: Makes all your Vils a bit more efficient.

build_orders.title: Archer Rush
build_orders.description: A well known build order for a Archer Rush (Scrush). You must go to Feudal age to build archers to harras the enemy base by idling the economy and picking off some Villagers.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Houses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/7)

queue.description: Build 4 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep, your berries and another woodline.
queue.title: 4->Wood (10/11)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (11/12)

queue.description: Build a House and a Mill and gather berries.
queue.title: 2->Berries (13/14)

queue.description: Get the second Boar. Also build 2 Farms on the upper and lower right TC spots with hurt Vils.
queue.title: 1->Boar (14/15)
2->Berries (16/17)
queue.description: Don't forget to build another house with a Wood Vil.
By now you should have found all your resources, and be on your way to scout your opponent(s).
queue.title: 4->Sheep/Boar under TC (20/21)

queue.description: Build a second Lumbercamp at another Wood line.
queue.title: 3->Wood (23/24)

queue.description: (recommended) This is a great time to get Loom. If you are having trouble with keeping your TC busy (e.g. you missed Sheep), you could research it earlier
queue.title: Loom
Feudal Age
queue.description: Build a Barracks and another house with a Wood Vil. When your Sheep/Berry Vils are done move 2 to Gold, 4 to Wood and the rest to Farms.

queue.title: 2 Archery Ranges, Wood Upgrade
queue.description: Then quickly buildtwo Archery Ranges with 2 Vils, and research some Economy upgrades

queue.title: 3->Farms (26/27)
queue.description: More Farms. Also build at least 2 Houses. Berry Vils should also go to Farms.

queue.title: 6->Food, 2->Gold (34/35)
queue.description: Make sure you continue building an army, based on what the enemies are building and your Civ's strengths. We need gold for that.

queue.title: 4-6 Archers (34/39)
queue.description: Build 4-6 Archers. When done attack the enemy Vils. Keep away from the TC and Skirmishers. Cause idle time and kill vils.

queue.title: Blacksmith, Fletching, Wheelbarrow
queue.description: Add Fletching to increase Archer damage, and wheelbarrow to make Vils a bit more efficient.

build_orders.title: Dark Age Rush
build_orders.description: Drush adds a few early militia. This is often a good idea if your resources are in unsafe (forward) position, so you can delay a potential Scout or Archer Rush that would be more effective against you. After reaching Feudal decide to continue with another strategy, Archers, Scouts or a FC.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Houses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/7)

queue.description: Build 4 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep, your berries and another woodline.
queue.title: 4->Wood (10/11)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (11/12)

queue.description: Build a House and a Mill and gather berries.
queue.title: 3->Berries (14/15)

queue.description: Get the second Boar. Also build 2 Farms on the upper and lower right TC spots with hurt Vils.
queue.title: 1->Boar (15/16)
1->Berries (16/17)
queue.description: Omnomnom!

queue.title: 1->House->Barracks->10 Gold->Food (17/18)
queue.description: Next Vil builds a House, then a Barracks, then gets exactly 10 Gold and ends up with Sheep or Deer (if you feel you can handle it).
Next 2 go to Sheep or Deer.
queue.title: 2->Sheep/Deer (19/20)
3 Militia (19/22)
queue.description: Build 3 Militia. When done send them out, so make sure you found your opponent's location and idle their Vils.
Add 2 more Vils to Wood.
queue.title: 2->Wood (21/22)

queue.description: Add 2 more Vils to Gold.
queue.title: 2->Gold (23/24)

queue.description: Add 2 more Vils to Food.
queue.title: 2->Wood (25/26)
Decide what to do next.
queue.description: Around this time you have to plan your next strategy, which you can base of your opponent. If you feel you have delayed your opponent enough, a Fast Castle might be a great idea. If you have to defend getting Loom and going up and making Spearmen or Skirmishers might work. Otherwise get more Militia and upgrade to Men-At-Arms.

build_orders.title: Fast Castle
build_orders.description: Fast Castle is a quick way to get to the Castle Age. This is often followed by either Knights or Booming to get a very strong economy.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Houses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/7)

queue.description: Build 4 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep, your berries and another woodline.
queue.title: 4->Wood (10/11)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (11/12)

queue.description: Build a House and a Mill and gather berries.
queue.title: 3->Berries (14/15)

queue.description: Get the second Boar. Also build 2 Farms on the upper and lower right TC spots with hurt Vils.
queue.title: 1->Boar (15/16)
1->Berries, Build a House  (16/17)
queue.description: Omnomnom!
Next 3 go to Sheep.
queue.title: 3->Sheep (19/20)
3->Wood, Build a House  (22/23)
queue.description: More Vils to Wood.

queue.title: 3->Gold (25/26)
queue.description: Build a Mining Camp and mine Gold.

queue.title: Deer with 4 Sheep Vils
queue.description: Build a Mill next to the Deer, or use your Scout to chase them to your TC.

queue.title: Idle Vils -> 4 Farms, Rest->Wood
queue.description: When your Sheep Vils are done make 4 extra Farms, and send the rest to get Wood.

queue.title: Loom
queue.description: Keep an eye on your opponent's plans.

queue.title: Feudal Age
queue.description: Also decide to go either Knights or Boom.

queue.title: If Boom: Gold Vils to Wood
queue.description: If you want to Boom you only need 200 Gold to go up, if you want to go Knights you will need more Gold.

queue.title: 2 Wood Vils Market, 1 Vil Blacksmith
queue.description: Upon reaching Feudal age instantly build 2 Markets and 1 Blacksmith

queue.title: 2 -> Wood (27/28)
queue.description: Upon reaching Feudal age build 2 Vils.

queue.title: if > 800 Food: Get Wood Upgrade
queue.description: You will need this to quickly get a lot of Wood and get map control in the Castle Age.

queue.title: Castle Age
queue.description: When your buildings are ready go to the Castle Age.

build_orders.title: Tower Rush
build_orders.description: In a Trush you have to gather Stone so you can build several towers near the opponents vital resources. This is a often used strategy when playing civs such as Koreans.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Houses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/7)

queue.description: Build 3 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep and your Berries.
queue.title: 3->Wood (9/10)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (10/11)

queue.description: Build a House and a Mill and gather berries.
queue.title: 3->Berries (13/14)

queue.description: Get the second Boar.
queue.title: 1->Boar (14/15)
1->Berries (15/16)
queue.description: Don't forget to build another house with a Wood Vil.
By now you should have found all your resources, and be on your way to scout your opponent.
queue.title: 3->Sheep/Boar under TC (18/19)

queue.description: Don't build another Lumbercamp, you will need your Wood.
queue.title: 3->Wood (21/22)

queue.description: Loom
queue.title: Loom

queue.description: Feudal Age
queue.title: Feudal Age

queue.description: 4 Boar Vils To Stone, 4 To Opponent. Make sure you properly scouted the area. You will want to place a Tower on his main Gold.
queue.title: Boar Vils: 4 Stone, 4 Opponent

queue.description: If your Vils arrive early, build a House, otherwise build one at home.
queue.title: House

queue.description: Quickly build a Tower in range of his main Gold, if possible also target his Stone. Use your Scout to harras Vils building a counter-Tower, so yours is up first.
queue.title: Tower Main Gold

build_orders.title: Galley Rush
build_orders.description: The Grush is a great strategy on Water maps to harras the opponents Fishing ships.

queue.description: Queue 3 Vils, Build two Houses, one with 2 Vils and the other with 1. Quickly scout your first 4 Sheep.
queue.title: Queue Vils, 2+1->2 Houses (3/0/4)

queue.description: The original 3 build Vils + 3 new ones must gather food from Sheep. If you haven't found your Sheep yet, cut the straggler trees.
queue.title: 3+3->Sheep (6/0/7)

queue.description: Build 4 Vils and send them to Wood. First one builds a Lumbercamp. Make sure you scout both boars, 4 more Sheep and another woodline.
queue.title: 5->Wood (11/0/12)

queue.description: Build the Dock, followed by a House. Then send the Vil to Food.
queue.title: 1->Dock, House, Food (12/0/13)

queue.description: Lure the Boar by attacking it twice and going back to TC. Deposit Food from Sheep Vils and attack the Boar when close. Garrison the damaged boar Vil until safe.
queue.title: 1->Boar (13/0/14)

queue.description: When your Dock is done get 4 Fishing Ships
queue.title: 4 Fishing Ships(13/4/18)

queue.description: More Food and a House
queue.title: 3->Food & House (16/4/24)

queue.description: Get your second Boar. Also build a House.
queue.title: 1->Second Boar & House (17/4/25)

queue.description: More on Food, use your Scout to chase some Deer to your TC.
queue.title: 2->Food (19/4/27)

queue.description: Get Loom if connected by land to your opponent, otherwise go up.
queue.title: Loom

queue.description: Go up.
queue.title: Feudal Age

queue.description: Food Vils: 5 to Gold, Rest Wood on second Lumbercamp.
queue.title: 5 from Food to Gold, Rest Wood

queue.description: Build 2 more Docks
queue.title: Build 2 more Docks

queue.description: Feudal Researched: Wood Upgrade, Blacksmith
queue.title: Wood Upgrade, Blacksmith.

queue.description: All Vils to Wood, Keep Building Fishing Ships, and start buildinga lot of Galleys from 2 Docks. Harras the enemy Fishing Ships and gain control over water.
queue.title: All->Wood, Many Fishing Ships, Many Galleys

queue.description: Upgrade to  your Galleys
queue.title: Fletching

queue.description: Upgrade your Galleys
queue.title: If lost Fishing Ships: Berries
